credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Four Small Sketches of Army Mules and Wagon.
medium: Graphite on cream colored wove paper, mounted in an album
description: Four small sketches drawn vertically on the page as follows: two hitched mules and a rider seen from the side; one harnessed mule and a second head, seen from the side; one wagon seen from the side; and two mules and a wagon, seen from the front.
name: Drawing
